body: I'm with you there. She says she loves her son and fucks him, but seemingly at the drop of a dime she's fuck some other dude (and getting pregnant). Just have the son find out and either drop her (like he should), or do something about it. Fucking slut.

I'm never really sure how to feel about her... she's such a huge slut but still loves her son so dearly that it's pretty sweet, yet easily goes to bounce on someones huge cock... not sure how to feel about this 😥
